meta.job_title: Technical Assistance and Quality Control Specialist

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide technical assistance and training for nonprofit loan packagers in the USDA 502 Direct Loan Application Packaging.
Ensure compliance with programmatic and administrative regulations and laws in the submission of loan files.
Produce quality and quantity loan packages in line with departmental goals.
Monitor compliance by RCAC and Qualified Employers as per signed Memorandum of Understandings.
Collaborate with lending partners and agencies.
Provide technical assistance in homeownership program development.
Promote and facilitate partnerships to maximize resources.
Prepare activity and outcome reports as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Housing Development, Affordable Mortgage Lending, or related field (Master's preferred).
